languages.text: "Ваша Светлость, с Януса приходят тревожные донесения. Среди населения удаленных агрокомплексов зафиксированы странные мутации. Помимо явно выраженного внешнего уродства и продиктованной им отчужденности, выродки — "немочи", как их зовут, — объединяются в группы и исповедают примитивную веру землепочитания. Хотя они и не демонстрируют угрозы или непокорности, их существование вызывает тревогу".

"Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}, there are alarming reports coming from Janus. A number of strange mutations have been spotted among the population in remote agri-complexes. Aside from the obvious disfigurement and the subsequent estrangement, these mutants — called 'retches' by the rest of the colonists — are coming together to practise a primitive form of religion involving ritual worship of the land. While they display no disobedience or hostility, their very existence is concerning."
languages.original_text: "Ваша Светлость, с Януса приходят тревожные донесения. Среди населения удаленных агрокомплексов зафиксированы странные мутации. Помимо явно выраженного внешнего уродства и продиктованной им отчужденности, выродки — "немочи", как их зовут, — объединяются в группы и исповедают примитивную веру землепочитания. Хотя они и не демонстрируют угрозы или непокорности, их существование вызывает тревогу".

traits.locale_text: "Your Grace, there are alarming reports coming from Janus. A number of strange mutations has been spotted among the population in remote agri-complexes. Aside from the obvious disfigurement and the subsequent estrangement, these mutants — called "wretches" by the rest of colonists — are coming together to practice a primitive form of religion involving earth worship. While they display no disobedience or hostility, their very existence is concerning."

Aside from the obvious disfigurement and the subsequent estrangement, these mutants — called "wretches" by the rest of colonists — are coming together to practice a primitive form of religion involving earth worship. While they display no disobedience or hostility, their very existence is concerning."

While they display no disobedience or hostility, their very existence is concerning."

languages.text: «Mi{mf|lord|lady}, nos llegan informes alarmantes de Janus. Se han avistado una serie de extrañas mutaciones en los habitantes de complejos agrícolas remotos. Además de su habitual desfiguración y consiguiente distanciamiento, estos mutantes, a quienes el resto de colonos llama "degenerados", se reúnen para practicar una adoración ritual de la tierra. Si bien no muestran desobediencia u hostilidad alguna, su mera existencia es preocupante».
languages.original_text: "Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}, there are alarming reports coming from Janus. A number of strange mutations have been spotted among the population in remote agri-complexes. Aside from the obvious disfigurement and the subsequent estrangement, these mutants — called 'retches' by the rest of the colonists — are coming together to practise a primitive form of religion involving ritual worship of the land. While they display no disobedience or hostility, their very existence is concerning."

traits.locale_text: «Mi{mf|lord|lady}, nos llegan informes alarmantes de Janus. Se han avistado una serie de extrañas mutaciones en los habitantes de complejos agrícolas remotos. Además de su habitual desfiguración y consiguiente distanciamiento, estos mutantes, a quienes el resto de colonos llama "degenerados", se reúnen para practicar una adoración ritual de la tierra. Si bien no muestran desobediencia u hostilidad alguna, su mera existencia es preocupante».

languages.text: « Votre Seigneurie, nous recevons des rapports alarmants en provenance de Janus. D'étranges mutations ont été observées parmi la population de certains agri-complexes reculés. Les malheureux touchés, baptisés "infâmes" par le reste de la population, sont affreusement défigurés et subissent des discriminations au sein de la colonie, mais ce n'est pas le plus étonnant : il leur arrive de se regrouper pour pratiquer une forme primitive de religion reposant sur le culte de la terre. Même s'ils ne montrent aucun signe d'hostilité ou de désobéissance, leur existence même est un problème inquiétant. »
languages.original_text: "Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}, there are alarming reports coming from Janus. A number of strange mutations have been spotted among the population in remote agri-complexes. Aside from the obvious disfigurement and the subsequent estrangement, these mutants — called 'retches' by the rest of the colonists — are coming together to practise a primitive form of religion involving ritual worship of the land. While they display no disobedience or hostility, their very existence is concerning."

traits.locale_text: « Votre Seigneurie, nous recevons des rapports alarmants en provenance de Janus. D'étranges mutations ont été observées parmi la population de certains agri-complexes reculés. Les malheureux touchés, baptisés "infâmes" par le reste de la population, sont affreusement défigurés et subissent des discriminations au sein de la colonie, mais ce n'est pas le plus étonnant : il leur arrive de se regrouper pour pratiquer une forme primitive de religion reposant sur le culte de la terre. Même s’ils ne montrent aucun signe d'hostilité ou de désobéissance, leur existence même est un problème inquiétant. »

languages.text: “舰长大人，加努斯传来了令人不安的报告。在偏远的综合农业中心，人们发现了多起人体异常突变现象。除了明显的形体异化以及随之产生的隔阂外，这些被其他殖民者称为‘丑恶种’的变种人还开始聚集起来，信奉某种与土地崇拜相关的原始宗教。尽管他们并未表现出任何反抗或敌对情绪，但这群人的存在却令人忧心忡忡。”
languages.original_text: "Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}, there are alarming reports coming from Janus. A number of strange mutations have been spotted among the population in remote agri-complexes. Aside from the obvious disfigurement and the subsequent estrangement, these mutants — called 'retches' by the rest of the colonists — are coming together to practise a primitive form of religion involving ritual worship of the land. While they display no disobedience or hostility, their very existence is concerning."

traits.locale_text: “舰长大人，加努斯传来了令人不安的报告。在偏远的综合农业中心，人们发现了多起人体异常突变现象。除了明显的形体异化以及随之产生的隔阂外，这些被其他殖民者称为‘丑恶种’的变种人还开始聚集起来，信奉某种与土地崇拜相关的原始宗教。尽管他们并未表现出任何反抗或敌对情绪，但这群人的存在却令人忧心忡忡。”

languages.text: 「陛下、ヤヌスから憂慮すべき報告が届いています。遠隔地にある農業施設で、住民の間に奇妙な突然変異が多数発見されています。奇形化やその後の離反はさておいても、これらの変異体（他の入植者からは「異民」と呼ばれています）は、土地の儀式的崇拝を含む原始的な宗教を実践するために集まってきています。彼らは反抗も敵意も示しませんが、その存在そのものが気がかりなものです」
languages.original_text: "Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}, there are alarming reports coming from Janus. A number of strange mutations have been spotted among the population in remote agri-complexes. Aside from the obvious disfigurement and the subsequent estrangement, these mutants — called 'retches' by the rest of the colonists — are coming together to practise a primitive form of religion involving ritual worship of the land. While they display no disobedience or hostility, their very existence is concerning."

traits.locale_text: 「陛下、ヤヌスから憂慮すべき報告が届いています。遠隔地にある農業施設で、住民の間に奇妙な突然変異が多数発見されています。奇形化やその後の離反はさておいても、これらの変異体（他の入植者からは「異民」と呼ばれています）は、土地の儀式的崇拝を含む原始的な宗教を実践するために集まってきています。彼らは反抗も敵意も示しませんが、その存在そのものが気がかりなものです」

languages.text: "Euer {mf|Lordschaft|Ladyschaft}, uns erreichen alarmierende Berichte von Janus. Unter der Bevölkerung in abgelegenen Agri-Komplexen ist eine Reihe merkwürdiger Mutationen aufgetreten. Die übrigen Kolonisten nennen diese Mutanten 'Speier'. Abgesehen von der üblichen Entstellung und der damit einhergehenden Ausgrenzung haben die Speier sich auch zu einer primitiven Form der Religion zusammengetan, bei der sie auf rituelle Weise das Land verehren. Sie zeigen zwar keinen Ungehorsam und keine Feindseligkeit, doch ihre bloße Existenz gibt Anlass zur Sorge."
languages.original_text: "Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}, there are alarming reports coming from Janus. A number of strange mutations have been spotted among the population in remote agri-complexes. Aside from the obvious disfigurement and the subsequent estrangement, these mutants — called 'retches' by the rest of the colonists — are coming together to practise a primitive form of religion involving ritual worship of the land. While they display no disobedience or hostility, their very existence is concerning."

languages.text: "{mf|Lord|Leydi} Hazretleri, Janus'tan endişe verici raporlar geliyor. Uzaktaki tarım komplekslerinde yaşayan halk arasında bir dizi tuhaf mutasyon tespit edildi. Bariz şekil bozukluklarının ardından yabancılaşma gösteren ve geri kalan koloniciler tarafından 'leşler' olarak adlandırılan bu mutantlar, diyara tapınma ayini içeren ilkel bir dinin kurallarına göre yaşamak için bir araya geliyorlar. İtaatsizlik ya da hasımlık sergilemeseler de varlıkları bile kaygı veriyor."
languages.original_text: "Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}, there are alarming reports coming from Janus. A number of strange mutations have been spotted among the population in remote agri-complexes. Aside from the obvious disfigurement and the subsequent estrangement, these mutants — called 'retches' by the rest of the colonists — are coming together to practise a primitive form of religion involving ritual worship of the land. While they display no disobedience or hostility, their very existence is concerning."
